item.title: Setting up Autofac with Caliburn Micro v3.2.0 and Autofac v4.8.1
item.description: I find myself frequently setting up new projects with Caliburn Micro; however, It isnâ€™t always easy to remember the code to integrate Autofac with the bootstrapper.
